description.author: Salesforce
text: A component that provides a radio button with custom label functionality, allowing users to select a given option. It includes the ability to check if the radio button is selected and to interact with the radio element.

elements.name: radioContainer
elements.description: Represents the custom radio button container.

elements.name: radioLabelSlot
elements.description: Represents the slot for custom label content inside the radio button.
